thread.title: roee hershko

author: roee hershko
title: roee hershko
text:
I purched in the past week 5 products includes Kara/NH/AP boosts and more, the service was excellent and the boost happened instantly with no wait time, i feel very safe with your service and i will prob always buy from you.
one time in kara i got a really bad boost group includes peoples with low IL and tons of wipes on bosses that run should have taken ages, i told my contact in skype and he fixed it and gave me new group in no time, i felt really that i know that you will do anything to make it happen
